67820BAF.Line3.146C80: There is a vile artifact buried in a hillside not far from here. Its purpose is to trap lost souls, leeching magic from them. Free those souls and perhaps they’ll help you in return.

8EFE61ED.Line1.146C80: Very good, these will do. You’ll need the essence of life, a spirit, to transform your Golem.

B7B8377C.VoiceDir3.146C80: annoyed at the artifact, but encouraging to the player
